        create a course notes controller
        Parameters:
        dao - class that interacts with the db for course notes
        courseDao - class that interacts with the db for courses
        userdao - class that interacts with the db for users
        prefix - path where the course notes will be uploaded

      • addAllPdfComments

        public java.lang.String addAllPdfComments(CourseNotes courseNotes,
                                          java.util.List<Comment> comments,
                                          boolean annotations,
                                          boolean questions)
        Description copied from interface: CourseNotesControllerInterface
        Creates a 'converted' pdf file, which is a new pdf file with all its comments added to it with iText.
        Specified by:
        addAllPdfComments in interface CourseNotesControllerInterface
        Parameters:
        courseNotes - The file you want to annotate
        comments - The list of comments for the courseNotes file (this should already be checked)
        annotations - whether or not annotations should be added to the pdf
        questions - whether or not questions should be added to the pdf
        Returns:
        url of the converted pdf file
